title: Bug 14942Unexpected KeyDown event after pressing non existing menu mnemonic
description: Bug 14942Unexpected KeyDown event after pressing non existing menu mnemonic Idon't think it should.
OB: build 20020426Run the test case below.press ALT+M to activate the pull down menupress a key other than s. A menu item with that mnemonic does not existpress ESC twice to back out of the menuSWT sends a KeyDown event with the pull down menu mnemonic as the character.
SR: build 20020426Run the test case below.press ALT+M to activate the pull down menupress a key other than s. A menu item with that mnemonic does not existpress ESC twice to back out of the menuSWT sends a KeyDown event with the pull down menu mnemonic as the character.
